notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.O. and R.R. conceived and initiated the work. A.O. planned the experiments and drafted the manuscript. S.G. performed the chemical composition analyses. A.O., M.B., M.D.A., S.C., M.T.M. collected the bacterial strains and performed the microbiology experiments. A.O., R.R. and V.V. reviewed and edited the manuscript. All the authors critically edited the manuscript before submission.
